CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL of the LAW prohibits inhuman and degrading treatment . Conditions of detention of remanded persons are regulated by ORG . LAW provides that conditions of detention in remand centres shall not be inhuman or degrading , and that these conditions shall correspond to the relevant requirements and norms established by ORG and other authorities .
